trans-unit.source: Module dependency installation support, Get-InstalledModule and Uninstall-Module cmdlets
trans-unit.target: 模块依赖项安装支持、Get-InstalledModule cmdlet 和 Uninstall-Module cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Added module dependencies population in the Publish-Module cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 在 Publish-Module cmdlet 中添加了模块依赖项填充。

trans-unit.source: The RequiredModules and NestedModules lists of PSModuleInfo are used in preparing the dependency list of a module to be published.
trans-unit.target: 在准备要发布的模块依赖项列表时使用的 PSModuleInfo 的 RequiredModules 和 NestedModules 列表。

trans-unit.source: Added dependency installation support in the Install-Module and Update-Module cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 在 Install-Module cmdlet 和 Update-Module cmdlet 中添加了依赖项安装支持。

trans-unit.source: Module dependencies are installed and updated by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下已安装和更新模块依赖项。

trans-unit.source: Added an -IncludeDependencies parameter to the Find-Module cmdlet to include module dependencies in the results.
trans-unit.target: 将 -IncludeDependencies 参数添加到了 Find-Module cmdlet 以在结果中包含模块依赖项。

trans-unit.source: Added -MaximumVersion support on the Find-Module, Install-Module, and Update-Module cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 在 Find-Module cmdlet、Install-Module cmdlet 和 Update-Module cmdlet 中添加了 -MaximumVersion 支持。

trans-unit.source: Added new Get-InstalledModule and Uninstall-Module cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 添加了新的 Get-InstalledModule cmdlet 和 Uninstall-Module cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: PowerShellGet cmdlets demo with module dependencies support:
trans-unit.target: 具有模块依赖项支持的 PowerShellGet cmdlet 演示：

trans-unit.source: Ensure that module dependencies are available on the repository:
trans-unit.target: 确保模块依赖项在存储库中可用：

trans-unit.source: Create a module with dependencies that are specified in the RequiredModules and NestedModules properties of its module manifest.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个模块，其中依赖项在其模块清单的 RequiredModules 和 NestedModules 属性中进行指定。

trans-unit.source: Publish two versions (**“1.0”** and **“2.0”**) of the TestDepWithNestedRequiredModules1 module with dependencies to the repository.
trans-unit.target: 将具有依赖项的 TestDepWithNestedRequiredModules1 模块的两个版本（**“1.0”**和**“2.0”**）发布到存储库中。

trans-unit.source: Find the TestDepWithNestedRequiredModules1 module with its dependencies by specifying -IncludeDependencies.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定 -IncludeDependencies 查找 TestDepWithNestedRequiredModules1 模块及其依赖项。

trans-unit.source: Use Find-Module metadata to find the module dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Find-Module 元数据查找模块依赖项。

trans-unit.source: Install the TestDepWithNestedRequiredModules1 module with dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 安装 TestDepWithNestedRequiredModules1 模块及其依赖项。

trans-unit.source: Update the TestDepWithNestedRequiredModules1 module with dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 更新 TestDepWithNestedRequiredModules1 模块及其依赖项。

trans-unit.source: Run the Uninstall-Module cmdlet to uninstall a module that you installed by using PowerShellGet.
trans-unit.target: 运行 Uninstall-Module cmdlet 以卸载通过使用 PowerShellGet 安装的模块。

trans-unit.source: If any other module depends on the module that you want to delete, PowerShellGet throws an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何其他模块依赖于你要删除的模块，则 PowerShellGet 会引发错误。

trans-unit.source: Save-Module cmdlet
trans-unit.target: Save-Module cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Update-ModuleManifest cmdlet
trans-unit.target: Update-ModuleManifest cmdlet

trans-unit.source: This new cmdlet is used to help update manifest file with input property values.
trans-unit.target: 此新的 cmdlet 用于通过输入属性值帮助更新清单文件。

trans-unit.source: It takes all parameters that Test-ModuleManifest does.
trans-unit.target: 它会接收 Test-ModuleManifest 接收的所有参数。

trans-unit.source: We notice that a lot of module authors would like to specify “\*” in exported values such as FunctionsToExport, CmdletsToExport, etc. During module publishing to PowerShell Gallery, unspecified functions and commands will not be populated properly onto the Gallery.
trans-unit.target: 我们注意到，许多模块作者想要在诸如 FunctionsToExport 和 CmdletsToExport 等导出值中指定“\*”。在将模块发布到 PowerShell 库期间，未指定的函数和命令将无法正确填充到库上。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, we suggest module authors update their manifests with proper values.
trans-unit.target: 因此，我们建议模块作者使用合适的值更新自己的清单。

trans-unit.source: If you have modules that have exported properties, Update-ModuleManifest will fill the specified manifest file with information from exported functions, cmdlets, variables etc:
trans-unit.target: 如果你的模块已导出属性，Update-ModuleManifest 将使用来自导出函数、cmdlet、变量等中的信息填充指定的清单文件。

trans-unit.source: After Update-ModuleManifest:
trans-unit.target: 使用 Update-ModuleManifest 之后：

trans-unit.source: For each module, there are also metadata fields associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 对于每个模块，还存在与之关联的元数据字段。

trans-unit.source: In order to display metadata properly on PowrShell Gallery, you can use Update-ModuleManifest to populate those fields under PrivateData.
trans-unit.target: 为了在 PowrShell 库中正确显示元数据，你可以使用 Update-ModuleManifest 在 PrivateData 下填充这些字段。

trans-unit.source: PrivateData hashtable from the manifest file template has the following properties:
trans-unit.target: 来自清单文件模板的 PrivateData 哈希表具有以下属性：

trans-unit.source: ***Note:*** DscResourcesToExport is only supported on the latest PowerShell version 5.0.
trans-unit.target: ***注意：***DscResourcesToExport 仅在最新的 PowerShell 5.0 版本上才受支持。

trans-unit.source: We won’t be able to update the field if you are running on previous PowerShell version.
trans-unit.target: 如果你正在之前的 PowerShell 版本上运行，我们将无法更新字段。
